item.title: Custom Siri Shortcuts
item.description: Make your Own Siri Shortcuts with Blocks Markdown to Rich text Input any text to this shortcut, which will be rendered to text and save it as pdf. Shortcut Link Markdown to Rich text Okay Input your favourite text and siri will read it for you. Shortcut Link Okay RightLeft Have you ever went on a random ride?
